artist: Utagawa Kunisada; Publisher: Iseya Kanekichi; Carver: Yokogawa Takejirō
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription: 秋の野の　萩のにしきを　故郷に　しかのねがら　うつしてしかな {Aki no no no / hagi no nishiki o / furusato ni / shika no ne gara / utsushite na}
markings: date seal: 子十 {ne jū} (Rat 10) | censor seals: 福 {Fuku} | 村松 {Muramatsu} | publisher's seal: {Isekane} | carver's seal: 横川彫竹 {Yokogawa hori Take}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
portfolio: The Visual Parody of the Thirty-Six Selected Poets (Mitate sanjūrokkasen no uchi 見立三十六歌撰之内)
signed: in toshidama cartouche: 豊國画 {Toyokuni ga}
title: Poem by Kiyowara Motosuke: (Actor Ichikawa Danzō VI as) the Hunter Shibaroku
